doc:
Diane Varsi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diane_Varsi 0 Diane Marie Antonia Varsi (February 23, 1938 – November 19, 1992) was an American film actress best known for her performances in Peyton Place – her film debut, for which she was nominated for an Academy Award – and the cult film Wild in the Streets. She left Hollywood in order to pursue personal and artistic aims, notably at Bennington College in Vermont, where she studied poetry with poet and translator Ben Belitt, among others. Diane_Marie_Antonia_Varsi ( February_23_,_1938 – November_19_,_1992 ) was an_American_film_actress best known for her_performances in Peyton_Place – her_film_debut , for which she was_nominated for an_Academy_Award – and the_cult_film_Wild in the_Streets . She left Hollywood in order to_pursue personal_and_artistic_aims , notably at Bennington_College in Vermont , where she studied poetry with poet_and_translator_Ben_Belitt , among others .
